title: Kadhal Mazhaiye Song Lyrics Jay Jay
stanzas:
Thaedi kidaipathillai
endru therindha oru porulai
thaedi paarpathendru
mei thaedal thodangiyadhe

kadhal mazhaiye
kadhal mazhaiye
enge vilundhaayo
kannil unnai kaanum
munne mannil vilundhaayo

alindhu unnai adaivathu
vazhvil saathiyamaa?
naan nadandhu konde
erivadhu unaku sammadhama?

Kannil oru thuli neer
mella kandru vilundhathile
vinnil oru vinmeen
satru visumbi azhuthadhuthaan

ullangai kadanthu engo
ozhugiya nimidangalai
mella sirai seiyyave
kadhal meendum padhivu seithen

Sangil kudhithuvida
oru samudhiram ninaipathupol
angam niraindhuvida
en aavi thudithadhuthaan

thaedi kidaippathillai
endru therindha oru porulai
thaedi paarpathendru
mei thedal thodangiyathe

kadhal mazhaiye
kadhal mazhaiye
enge vilundhaayo
kannil unnai kaanum
munne mannil vilundhaayo

alindhu unnai adaivathu
vazhvil saathiyamaa?
naan nadandhu konde
erivadhu unaku sammadhama?

vazhndha vazhvirukkum
vazhum naatkakalukkum
porule neethaan
uyire vaaraai.
vaaraai. vaaraai.
